channel.title: Clean, Basic Server?
channel.description:
I've been looking around for a good server download that is as close to actual RuneScape as possible. I don't care too much about what version it is, so long as it's somewhere between 300 and 720.
I tried out Matrix 718, but it has quite a bit of custom content and a lot of things weren't working. Although I'm new to RSPSs, I've made private servers for other games in the past (such as EverQuest and WoW), so I have no issue with the coding or anything. I'm simply looking for a "fresh" server download that I can customize and eventually release. Are there any server downloads that are just basic RuneScape out there? Or even just a server that has custom content, but isn't so buggy?
Thank you!

item.title: Clean, Basic Server?
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

I’m using MITB srcAllDummysRemoved which you can download here:
https://www.moparisthebest.com/downloads/srcAllDummysRemoved.tar.gz

There’s a few things you need to add to get it to function properly with the server. I believe prayer & pk headicons need to be fixed or weird shit happens, such as not seeing text above your head, and not seeing any hitsplats or a hitpoints bar.
And as sk8erdude also mentioned, NPC bits

Read full topic

item.title: Clean, Basic Server?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Helrayser, post:4, topic:553238”]Asteria looks awesome. Thanks!

Can anyone recommend a good client to use with it?[/quote]
Last I recall basically any 317 client will work with it. Though on a couple of them you may have to change the npc/player bits to match the servers (or vice versa)

Read full topic

item.title: Clean, Basic Server?
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Asteria 3.0 is some good stuff. It has enough to get you started.

Read full topic

item.title: Clean, Basic Server?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Honestly what you’re asking for doesn’t really exist.

You say “clean” but then ask for runescape-esque features. That in itself is contradictory.

Your options are basically:
Find a clean (And possibly stable) server/client.
Find a package that has content you want and deal with the bugs/etc as they’re found (Most typical way, can cause frustration when you get to “unsolvable” bugs)
Write your own.

Read full topic
